short_summary: Purchase of fresh fruits and vegetables
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of federal departments, wishes to issue Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSOs) for the purchase of fresh fruits and vegetables, as and when required.
duration_in_months: They do not indicate the exact number of months that the contract goals can last
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### E6MON-23PQFL - Period 11 - RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables

**Tender Reference:** WS3971410438-Doc3983422684
**Notice Publication Date:** March 8, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 4, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of federal departments, invites bidders to participate in the procurement of Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSOs) for the purchase of fresh fruits and vegetables. The procurement will cover a variety of items, including:

* Fresh fruits (*Unspsc 50300000*)
* Fresh vegetables (*Unspsc 50400000*)

The RMSO will cover deliveries in the following regions:

* Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* Montreal areas
* Quebec City
* Bagotville
* La Macaza
* Port-Cartier

### Key Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** WTO GPA, CFTA, Canada-UK TCA, CETA, CUFTA, CPFTA, CPTPP, CKFTA, CCFTA, and Canada-Honduras FTA.

### Contact Information

* Name: Lisa-Marie Julien (PSPC/SPAC)
* Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

For more information and to access the tender, please visit: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18865195?extsite=MTg4NjUxOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18865195?extsite=MTg4NjUxOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Dates

* Notice publication date: March 8, 2024
* Tender closing date: April 4, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time) 
* Expected contract start date: N/A
* Expected contract end date: June 30, 2024

The procurement is a request for Standing Offers. Bidders must determine their own eligibility to participate in the procurement
